trans-unit.target: E vai ver os criminais que o Día unidos guiador,

trans-unit.source: Their garments of liquid pitch and their faces covered by the Fire.
trans-unit.target: As súas roupas serán de alcatrán e os rostros cubertos polo lume.

trans-unit.source: So that Allah will recompense every soul for what it earned. Indeed, Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: De xeito que Deus vai recompensar cada alma ao que gañou.

trans-unit.source: This [Qur'an] is notification for the people that they may be warned thereby and that they may know that He is but one God and that those of understanding will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Este [Corán] é a notificación ás persoas que poidan ser avisado así, e para que saiban que é un só Deus e que aqueles de entendemento será recordado.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the Book and a clear Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Ra.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish that they had been Muslims.
trans-unit.target: Quizais os incrédulos vai desexan que foran musulmáns.

trans-unit.source: Let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by [false] hope, for they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Deixe-os comer e divertirse-se e ser desviado pola esperanza [falsa], xa que van saber.

trans-unit.source: And We did not destroy any city but that for it was a known decree.
trans-unit.target: E nós non destruír calquera cidade, pero que para el foi un decreto coñecido.

trans-unit.source: No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter.
trans-unit.target: Ningunha nación vai preceder a súa vixencia, nin eles permanecen despois.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad.
trans-unit.target: E eles din: "Ó vós a quen a mensaxe foi enviada baixo, en realidade, está tolo.

trans-unit.source: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful?"
trans-unit.target: Por que non nos traen os anxos, se ten que estar entre os correctos? "

trans-unit.source: We do not send down the angels except with truth; and the disbelievers would not then be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: Non enviamos abaixo os anxos, excepto coa verdade;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian.
trans-unit.target: En realidade, é Nós, que revelou o Corán e, en realidade, nós será o seu gardián.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muhammad], among the sects of the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: Habiamos enviado [mensaxeiros] antes de ti, [Ó Muhammad], entre as seitas dos primitivos.

trans-unit.source: And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him.
trans-unit.target: E ningún mensaxeiro viría a eles, agás que o ridicularizavam.

trans-unit.source: Thus do We insert denial into the hearts of the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Así é que imos introducir a negación nos corazóns dos criminais.

trans-unit.source: They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: Eles non van crer nel, mentres que hai xa ocorreu o precedente dos antigos pobos.

trans-unit.source: And [even] if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend,
trans-unit.target: E [mesmo] se Abrimos a eles un portón do ceo e eles seguiron nela para subir,

trans-unit.source: They would say, "Our eyes have only been dazzled. Rather, we are a people affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: Eles dicían: "Os nosos ollos só foron deslumbrado. Pola contra, somos un pobo afectadas por maxia."

trans-unit.source: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers.
trans-unit.target: E nós temos colocado dentro os ceos grandes estrelas e embelecedor-lo para os observadores.

trans-unit.source: And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]
trans-unit.target: E temos o protexía de cada diaño expulsado [da misericordia de Deus]

trans-unit.source: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame.
trans-unit.target: Excepto aquel que rouba unha audiencia e é perseguido por unha chama ardente clara.

trans-unit.source: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein [something] of every well-balanced thing.
trans-unit.target: E a terra - Nos espallalas-lo e lanza montañas nel firmemente establecidos e causou a medrar nel [algo] de cada cousa ben equilibrada.

trans-unit.source: And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers.
trans-unit.target: E fixemos para ti significa nel de vida e [a] aqueles para os cales non está provedores.

trans-unit.source: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure.
trans-unit.target: E non é unha cousa, pero que nós son os seus depositarios, e nós non enviá-lo para abaixo, excepto segundo unha medida coñecida.

trans-unit.source: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers.
trans-unit.target: E Enviamos os ventos de fertilización e envía auga do ceo e deu de beber a partir del.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor.
trans-unit.target: E, de feito, nós é que dou a vida ea morte, e nós somos o herdeiro.

trans-unit.source: And We have already known the preceding [generations] among you, and We have already known the later [ones to come].
trans-unit.target: E xa temos coñecido nos últimos [xeracións] entre vós, e xa coñecidas as posteriores [aqueles para vir].

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: E, de feito, o seu Señor ha reunir los;

trans-unit.source: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud.
trans-unit.target: E fixemos certamente creou o home a partir do barro dunha lama negra alterada.

trans-unit.source: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire.
trans-unit.target: E os xenios Nós creado antes do lume abrasador.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud.
trans-unit.target: E [mención, ó Muhammad], cando o teu Señor dixo aos anxos: "Vou crear un ser humano de arxila dunha lama negra alterada.

trans-unit.source: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."
trans-unit.target: E cando ten proporcionado el e soprou-lle a miña alma [creado] logo caerlle en postración. "

trans-unit.source: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely,
trans-unit.target: Así, os anxos prostráronse - todos eles enteiramente,

trans-unit.source: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated.
trans-unit.target: Excepto Iblis, el negouse a estar con aqueles que se prostrou.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"
trans-unit.target: [Alá] dixo: Ó Lucifer, o que é [o tema] contigo que non está con quen prostram? "

trans-unit.source: He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud."
trans-unit.target: El dixo: "Nunca iría me prostro a un ser humano a quen ti creaches de arxila dunha lama negra modificada."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled.
trans-unit.target: [Alá] dixo: "Entón, saír dela, pois en realidade, está expulsado.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense."
trans-unit.target: E, de feito, enriba de ti é a maldición ata o Día do Xuízo ".

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."
trans-unit.target: El dixo: "Meu Señor, entón me prorrogar ata o día en que se resucitados."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved
trans-unit.target: [Alá] dixo: "Entón, en realidade, é deses tolerados

trans-unit.source: Until the Day of the time well-known."
trans-unit.target: Ata o Día do tempo ben coñecido ".

trans-unit.source: [Iblees] said, "My Lord, because You have put me in error, I will surely make [disobedience] attractive to them on earth, and I will mislead them all
trans-unit.target: [Lucifer] dixo: "Meu Señor, porque ti me poñer en erro, eu certamente pode facer [a desobediencia] atractivo para eles na terra, e eu vou erro-los todos

trans-unit.source: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
trans-unit.target: Excepto, entre eles, os seus servos escollidos ".

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "This is a path [of return] to Me [that is] straight.
trans-unit.target: [Alá] dixo: "Este é un camiño [de retorno] para min [que é] recta.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, My servants - no authority will you have over them, except those who follow you of the deviators.
trans-unit.target: De feito, os meus servos - ningunha autoridade terá sobre eles, excepto aqueles que che seguen dos desviadores.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all.
trans-unit.target: E, de feito, o inferno é o lugar prometido para todos eles.

trans-unit.source: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated."
trans-unit.target: Ten sete portas;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs.
trans-unit.target: De feito, os xustos estarán entre xardíns e fontes.

trans-unit.source: [Having been told], "Enter it in peace, safe [and secure]."
trans-unit.target: [Sendo dito] "Enter lo en paz, en seguridade [e garantir]."

trans-unit.source: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, [so they will be] brothers, on thrones facing each other.
trans-unit.target: E iremos eliminar o que está nos seus seos de resentimento, [para que será] irmáns, en tronos diante a outro.

trans-unit.source: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they [ever] be removed.
trans-unit.target: Sen fatiga pode tocalos nela, nin a partir del será que eles [xa] ser eliminado.

trans-unit.source: [O Muhammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: [O Muhammad] informar os meus servos que é que son o Clemente, o misericordioso.

trans-unit.source: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: E que é o meu castigo, que é o doloroso castigo.

trans-unit.source: And inform them about the guests of Abraham,
trans-unit.target: E informarlles los sobre os convidados de Abraham,

trans-unit.source: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." [Abraham] said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you."
trans-unit.target: Cando entraron con el e dixo: "Paz".

trans-unit.source: [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy."
trans-unit.target: [Os anxos] dixo: "Non teña medo. En realidade, nós dámoslle boas novas dun neno aprendeu."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what [wonder] do you inform?"
trans-unit.target: El dixo: "Vostede me deu boas novas, aínda que a vellez veu enriba de min? Entón, o que [marabilla] vostede informar?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing."
trans-unit.target: Eles dixeron: "Nós demos-lle boas novas en realidade, polo tanto, non ser dos desesperados."

trans-unit.source: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray?"
trans-unit.target: El dixo: "E quen desespera a misericordia do Señor, excepto para aqueles enganados?"

trans-unit.source: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
trans-unit.target: [Abraham] dixo: "Entón o que é a súa empresa [aquí], o mensaxeiros?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals,
trans-unit.target: Eles dixeron: "En realidade, fomos enviados a un pobo de criminais,

trans-unit.source: Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all
trans-unit.target: Excepto a familia de Lot;

trans-unit.source: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind.
trans-unit.target: Excepto a súa muller. "Allah decretou que é dos que quedan atrás.

trans-unit.source: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot,
trans-unit.target: E cando os mensaxeiros á familia de Lot,

trans-unit.source: He said, "Indeed, you are people unknown."
trans-unit.target: El dixo: "En realidade, vostedes son persoas descoñecidas".

trans-unit.source: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing,
trans-unit.target: Eles dixeron: "Pero temos que chegou a ti con ese sobre o que eles estaban disputando,

trans-unit.source: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful.
trans-unit.target: E vimos que a verdade, e, de feito, estamos certos.

trans-unit.source: So set out with your family during a portion of the night and follow behind them and let not anyone among you look back and continue on to where you are commanded."
trans-unit.target: Entón, partiu coa súa familia durante unha parte da noite e seguir detrás deles e non deixe a ninguén entre mira cara atrás e seguir de onde é ordenado. "

trans-unit.source: And We conveyed to him [the decree] of that matter: that those [sinners] would be eliminated by early morning.
trans-unit.target: E nós transmitida a el [o decreto] de que o asunto: a de que os [pecadores] serían eliminados pola mañá cedo.

trans-unit.source: And the people of the city came rejoicing.
trans-unit.target: E a xente da cidade viñeron xúbilo.

trans-unit.source: [Lot] said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me.
trans-unit.target: [Lot] dixo: "En realidade, estes son os meus invitados, polo que non me avergoñar.

trans-unit.source: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me."
trans-unit.target: Temei a Deus e non me avergoñar. "

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from [protecting] people?"
trans-unit.target: Eles dixeron: "Xa que non prohibiu a partir de [protección] persoas?"

trans-unit.source: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]."
trans-unit.target: [Lot] dixo: "Estas son as miñas fillas - se sería cumpridores [de matrimonio legal]."

trans-unit.source: By your life, [O Muhammad], indeed they were, in their intoxication, wandering blindly.
trans-unit.target: Pola súa vida, [Ó Muhammad], en realidade eles foron, na súa embriaguez, vacilantes.

trans-unit.source: So the shriek seized them at sunrise.
trans-unit.target: Así, o berro aprehendeu-los ao amencer.

trans-unit.source: And We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of hard clay.
trans-unit.target: E fixemos a maior parte [da cidade] seu máis baixo e choveron sobre eles pedras de arxila dura.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern.
trans-unit.target: De feito, en que hai sinais para os que discernem.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, those cities are [situated] on an established road.
trans-unit.target: E, de feito, estas cidades son [situado] nunha estrada establecida.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.
trans-unit.target: De feito, no que é un sinal para os fieis.

trans-unit.source: And the companions of the thicket were [also] wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: E os compañeiros do mato foron [tamén] malfeitores.

trans-unit.source: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both [cities] are on a clear highway.
trans-unit.target: Por iso, tomou a retribución deles, e, de feito, os dous [cidades] están nunha estrada clara.

trans-unit.source: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers.
trans-unit.target: E por suposto que os compañeiros de Thamud negar os mensaxeiros.

trans-unit.source: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away.
trans-unit.target: E Demos lles nosos sinais, pero a partir deles que estaban afastando.

trans-unit.source: And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure.
trans-unit.target: E utilizaban para esculpir das montañas, casas, sentirse seguro.

trans-unit.source: But the shriek seized them at early morning.
trans-unit.target: Pero o berro aprehendeu-los no inicio da mañá.

trans-unit.source: So nothing availed them [from] what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Polo tanto, nada lles valeu [de] o que adoitaba gañar.

trans-unit.source: And We have not created the heavens and earth and that between them except in truth. And indeed, the Hour is coming; so forgive with gracious forgiveness.
trans-unit.target: E non creamos o ceo ea terra e que, entre eles, agás na verdade.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator.
trans-unit.target: De feito, o seu Señor - El é o Creador Categoría.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly given you, [O Muhammad], seven of the often repeated [verses] and the great Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: E nós temos seguro deu, [Ó Muhammad], sete das moitas veces repetidas [versos] eo gran Corán.

trans-unit.source: Do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [certain] categories of the disbelievers, and do not grieve over them. And lower your wing to the believers
trans-unit.target: Non estenda os seus ollos para aquel polo cal Temos dado diversión para [certas] categorías de os incrédulos, e non sufrir con eles.

trans-unit.source: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner" -
trans-unit.target: E dicir: "En realidade, eu son o claro Warner" -

trans-unit.source: Just as We had revealed [scriptures] to the separators
trans-unit.target: Así como nós revelara [escrituras] para fichas

trans-unit.source: Who have made the Qur'an into portions.
trans-unit.target: Que fixeron o Corán en porcións.

trans-unit.source: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all
trans-unit.target: Entón, polo seu Señor, nós certamente pode cuestionalas todos

trans-unit.source: About what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Sobre o que adoitaban facer.

trans-unit.source: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists.
trans-unit.target: Logo declare o que está ordenado e afastarse dos politeístas.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers
trans-unit.target: En realidade, son suficientes para ti contra os zombadores

trans-unit.source: Who make [equal] with Allah another deity. But they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Que fan [igual] con Deus, outra divindade.

trans-unit.source: And We already know that your breast is constrained by what they say.
trans-unit.target: E xa sabemos que o seu peito é limitado polo o que eles din.

trans-unit.source: So exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him].
trans-unit.target: Entón exaltar [Alá] co loanza do Señor e ser quen prostrar [a El].

trans-unit.source: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death).
trans-unit.target: E adorar o Señor, ata que chega a ti seguro (morte).

trans-unit.source: The command of Allah is coming, so be not impatient for it. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: A orde de Deus está chegando, non ser impaciente para el.

trans-unit.source: He sends down the angels, with the inspiration of His command, upon whom He wills of His servants, [telling them], "Warn that there is no deity except Me; so fear Me."
trans-unit.target: Envía os anxos, coa inspiración do seu mando, a quen lle apraz entre os seus servos, [dicindo] "Avisar que non hai divindade alén de min, e teme-me."

trans-unit.source: He created the heavens and earth in truth. High is He above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: El creou o ceo ea terra en realidade.

trans-unit.source: He created man from a sperm-drop; then at once, he is a clear adversary.
trans-unit.target: El creou o home a partir dunha gota de esperma;

trans-unit.source: And the grazing livestock He has created for you; in them is warmth and [numerous] benefits, and from them you eat.
trans-unit.target: E o gando pastar Creou para ti;

trans-unit.source: And for you in them is [the enjoyment of] beauty when you bring them in [for the evening] and when you send them out [to pasture].
trans-unit.target: E para ti neles é [o goce de] beleza cando traelos [para a noite], e cando envialos [ao pasto].

trans-unit.source: And they carry your loads to a land you could not have reached except with difficulty to yourselves. Indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: E cargar as súas cargas para unha terra que non podería ter chegado a salvo con dificultade para vós.

trans-unit.source: And [He created] the horses, mules and donkeys for you to ride and [as] adornment. And He creates that which you do not know.
trans-unit.target: E [Creou] os cabalos, mulas e burros para montar e adorno [como].

trans-unit.source: And upon Allah is the direction of the [right] way, and among the various paths are those deviating. And if He willed, He could have guided you all.
trans-unit.target: E en Allah é a dirección do camiño [dereita] e entre os distintos camiños son aqueles desvío.

trans-unit.source: It is He who sends down rain from the sky; from it is drink and from it is foliage in which you pasture [animals].
trans-unit.target: É El quen envía a auga do ceo;

trans-unit.source: He causes to grow for you thereby the crops, olives, palm trees, grapevines, and from all the fruits. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: Fai medrar para vostede, así, os cultivos, olivas, Palmeira, videiras, e de todos os froitos.

trans-unit.source: And He has subjected for you the night and day and the sun and moon, and the stars are subjected by His command. Indeed in that are signs for a people who reason.
trans-unit.target: E El someteu para noite e día, o sol ea lúa e as estrelas están sometidos ao seu mando.

trans-unit.source: And [He has subjected] whatever He multiplied for you on the earth of varying colors. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who remember.
trans-unit.target: E [El someteu] todo o que El multiplicouse para ti na terra de cores variadas.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who subjected the sea for you to eat from it tender meat and to extract from it ornaments which you wear. And you see the ships plowing through it, and [He subjected it] that you may seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful.
trans-unit.target: E é El quen someteu ao mar para que poida comer del carne suave e extraer dela adornos que viste.

trans-unit.source: And He has cast into the earth firmly set mountains, lest it shift with you, and [made] rivers and roads, that you may be guided,
trans-unit.target: E Lanzou á terra firmemente establecido montañas, para que non cambiar con vostede, e [feita] ríos e estradas, que pode ser guiado,

trans-unit.source: And landmarks. And by the stars they are [also] guided.
trans-unit.target: E Marcos.

trans-unit.source: Then is He who creates like one who does not create? So will you not be reminded?
trans-unit.target: Entón é el que crea como alguén que non crea?

trans-unit.source: And if you should count the favors of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: E se ten que contar as mercés de Deus, non podería enumera-los.

trans-unit.source: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you declare.
trans-unit.target: E Deus sabe o que ocultar e que declarar.

trans-unit.source: And those they invoke other than Allah create nothing, and they [themselves] are created.
trans-unit.target: E os que invocan no canto de Deus crear nada, e eles [si] son creados.

trans-unit.source: They are, [in fact], dead, not alive, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Son, [en realidade] morto, non vivo, e eles non entenden cando serán resucitados.

trans-unit.source: Your god is one God. But those who do not believe in the Hereafter - their hearts are disapproving, and they are arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Seu Deus é un Deus.

trans-unit.source: Assuredly, Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare. Indeed, He does not like the arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Seguramente, Deus sabe o que ocultan eo que declaran.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "What has your Lord sent down?" They say, "Legends of the former peoples,"
trans-unit.target: E cando se di a eles: "Que o Señor enviou abaixo?"

trans-unit.source: That they may bear their own burdens in full on the Day of Resurrection and some of the burdens of those whom they misguide without knowledge. Unquestionably, evil is that which they bear.
trans-unit.target: Para que teñan os seus propios gastos na súa totalidade, o Día da Resurrección e algúns dos cargos dos que eles desencaminhar sen coñecemento.

trans-unit.source: Those before them had already plotted, but Allah came at their building from the foundations, so the roof fell upon them from above them, and the punishment came to them from where they did not perceive.
trans-unit.target: Aqueles antes deles xa planeara, pero Deus veu no seu predio desde a fundación, de xeito que o teito caeu sobre eles de enriba deles, eo castigo veu a eles de onde non se dan conta.

trans-unit.source: Then on the Day of Resurrection He will disgrace them and say, "Where are My 'partners' for whom you used to oppose [the believers]?" Those who were given knowledge will say, "Indeed disgrace, this Day, and evil are upon the disbelievers" -
trans-unit.target: Entón, o Día da Resurrección, que vai desgraçar los e dicir: "Onde están os" socios "para quen usou para se opor [os crentes]?"

trans-unit.source: The ones whom the angels take in death [while] wronging themselves, and [who] then offer submission, [saying], "We were not doing any evil." But, yes! Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: Aqueles a quen os anxos levan en morte [mentres] ofender-se, e [que], a continuación, ofrecen submisión, [dicindo]: "Nós non estabamos facendo o mal."

trans-unit.source: So enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and how wretched is the residence of the arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Entón entrar nos portas do inferno, onde permanecereis sempre, e como pésima é a morada dos arrogantes.

trans-unit.source: And it will be said to those who feared Allah, "What did your Lord send down?" They will say, "[That which is] good." For those who do good in this world is good; and the home of the Hereafter is better. And how excellent is the home of the righteous -
trans-unit.target: E vai ser dito para os que temían a Deus, "Que o Señor enviar abaixo?"

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence, which they will enter, beneath which rivers flow. They will have therein whatever they wish. Thus does Allah reward the righteous -
trans-unit.target: Xardíns do Edén, que entrarán, por baixo dos cales corren os ríos.

trans-unit.source: The ones whom the angels take in death, [being] good and pure; [the angels] will say, "Peace be upon you. Enter Paradise for what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: Aqueles a quen os anxos levan á morte, [ser] bo e puro;

trans-unit.source: Do the disbelievers await [anything] except that the angels should come to them or there comes the command of your Lord? Thus did those do before them. And Allah wronged them not, but they had been wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: Será que os incrédulos esperan [nada] salvo que os anxos se presenten a eles ou alí vén o mando do seu Señor?

trans-unit.source: So they were struck by the evil consequences of what they did and were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Entón, eles foron afectados polas malas consecuencias do que fixeron e foron implicados por aquilo de que escarneciam.

trans-unit.source: And those who associate others with Allah say, "If Allah had willed, we would not have worshipped anything other than Him, neither we nor our fathers, nor would we have forbidden anything through other than Him." Thus did those do before them. So is there upon the messengers except [the duty of] clear notification?
trans-unit.target: E os que asocian outros con Allah dicir: "Se Deus quixese, non tería adorado outra cousa que El, nin nós, nin os nosos pais, nin teríamos prohibido calquera cousa a través doutra que."

trans-unit.source: And We certainly sent into every nation a messenger, [saying], "Worship Allah and avoid Taghut." And among them were those whom Allah guided, and among them were those upon whom error was [deservedly] decreed. So proceed through the earth and observe how was the end of the deniers.
trans-unit.target: E Nós seguramente enviamos para cada nación un mensaxeiro, [dicindo] "Adorade a Deus e evitar Taghut."

trans-unit.source: [Even] if you should strive for their guidance, [O Muhammad], indeed, Allah does not guide those He sends astray, and they will have no helpers.
trans-unit.target: [Aínda] débese esforzarse para a súa orientación, [Ó Muhammad], en realidade, Allah non orienta os que El envía extraviados, e non terá axudantes.

trans-unit.source: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths [that] Allah will not resurrect one who dies. But yes - [it is] a true promise [binding] upon Him, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: E xuran por Allah seus xuramentos máis fortes [que] Deus non vai resucitar aquel que morre.

trans-unit.source: [It is] so He will make clear to them [the truth of] that wherein they differ and so those who have disbelieved may know that they were liars.
trans-unit.target: [É] para que el vai deixar claro para eles [a verdade] aquel en que son diferentes e por iso os que non creron pode saber que eran mentirosos.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Our word to a thing when We intend it is but that We say to it, "Be," and it is.
trans-unit.target: En realidade, a nosa palabra a unha cousa cando Pretendemos que é, pero o que dicimos a el, "Be", e é.

trans-unit.source: And those who emigrated for [the cause of] Allah after they had been wronged - We will surely settle them in this world in a good place; but the reward of the Hereafter is greater, if only they could know.
trans-unit.target: E os que emigraron para [a causa] Allah, despois de ser injustiçado - Nós certamente pode resolvelos los neste mundo nun bo lugar;

trans-unit.source: [They are] those who endured patiently and upon their Lord relied.
trans-unit.target: [Son] quen soportou con paciencia e sobre o seu Señor confiou.

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you except men to whom We revealed [Our message]. So ask the people of the message if you do not know.
trans-unit.target: E nós non enviou diante de vós, excepto os homes a quen revela [nosa mensaxe].

trans-unit.source: [We sent them] with clear proofs and written ordinances. And We revealed to you the message that you may make clear to the people what was sent down to them and that they might give thought.
trans-unit.target: [Enviamos los] con probas claras e ordenanzas escritas.

trans-unit.source: Then, do those who have planned evil deeds feel secure that Allah will not cause the earth to swallow them or that the punishment will not come upon them from where they do not perceive?
trans-unit.target: A continuación, fai os que teñen planeado malas accións se senten seguros de que Deus non fará que a terra para comelas-los ou que o castigo non virá sobre eles desde onde non se dan conta?

trans-unit.source: Or that He would not seize them during their [usual] activity, and they could not cause failure?
trans-unit.target: Ou que non estaba a aproveitala las durante a súa actividade [habitual], e eles non poderían causar o fallo?

trans-unit.source: Or that He would not seize them gradually [in a state of dread]? But indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ou que non estaba a aproveitala las gradualmente [nun estado de medo]?

trans-unit.source: Have they not considered what things Allah has created? Their shadows incline to the right and to the left, prostrating to Allah, while they are humble.
trans-unit.target: Quizais, non considerou que cousas Deus creou?

trans-unit.source: And to Allah prostrates whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth of creatures, and the angels [as well], and they are not arrogant.
trans-unit.target: A Deus se prostra todo o que hai no ceo e todo o que está na terra de criaturas, e os anxos [ben], e eles non son arrogantes.

trans-unit.source: They fear their Lord above them, and they do what they are commanded.
trans-unit.target: Eles temen seu Señor enriba deles, e eles fan o que lles é ordenado.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has said, "Do not take for yourselves two deities. He is but one God, so fear only Me."
trans-unit.target: E Deus dixo: "Non Tomé para vós dúas divindades. El é un só Deus, polo tanto, só o medo Me".

trans-unit.source: And to Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth, and to Him is [due] worship constantly. Then is it other than Allah that you fear?
trans-unit.target: E a El pertence todo canto existe no ceo e na terra, e para el é culto [debido] constantemente.

trans-unit.source: And whatever you have of favor - it is from Allah. Then when adversity touches you, to Him you cry for help.
trans-unit.target: E o que ten de favor - que é de Deus.

trans-unit.source: Then when He removes the adversity from you, at once a party of you associates others with their Lord
trans-unit.target: Entón cando elimina a adversidade de ti, dunha soa vez un grupo de asocia os outros co seu Señor

trans-unit.source: So they will deny what We have given them. Then enjoy yourselves, for you are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Entón, eles van negar o que lles dei.

trans-unit.source: And they assign to what they do not know a portion of that which We have provided them. By Allah, you will surely be questioned about what you used to invent.
trans-unit.target: E eles atribúen ao que eles non saben unha porción do que nós fornecen a eles.

trans-unit.source: And they attribute to Allah daughters - exalted is He - and for them is what they desire.
trans-unit.target: E eles atribúen ás fillas Allah - exaltado é el - e para eles é o que desexan.

trans-unit.source: And when one of them is informed of [the birth of] a female, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief.
trans-unit.target: E cando un deles é informado sobre [o nacemento] unha muller, o seu rostro se fai escuro, e suprime a dor.

trans-unit.source: He hides himself from the people because of the ill of which he has been informed. Should he keep it in humiliation or bury it in the ground? Unquestionably, evil is what they decide.
trans-unit.target: El esconde-se das persoas por mor do mal de que fose informado.

trans-unit.source: For those who do not believe in the Hereafter is the description of evil; and for Allah is the highest attribute. And He is Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Para aqueles que non cren na outra vida é a descrición do mal;

trans-unit.source: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for their wrongdoing, He would not have left upon the earth any creature, but He defers them for a specified term. And when their term has come, they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede [it].
trans-unit.target: E se Deus fose para impoñer culpa sobre o pobo para a súa iniquidade, non deixaría sobre a terra calquera criatura, pero El apraza-los por un período especificado.

trans-unit.source: And they attribute to Allah that which they dislike, and their tongues assert the lie that they will have the best [from Him]. Assuredly, they will have the Fire, and they will be [therein] neglected.
trans-unit.target: E eles atribúen a Deus o que non quere, e as súas linguas afirmar a mentira de que eles van ter o mellor [del].

trans-unit.source: By Allah, We did certainly send [messengers] to nations before you, but Satan made their deeds attractive to them. And he is the disbelievers' ally today [as well], and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Por Deus, nós seguramente enviar [mensaxeiros] para nacións diante de ti, pero Satanás fixo as súas obras atractivo para eles.

trans-unit.source: And We have not revealed to you the Book, [O Muhammad], except for you to make clear to them that wherein they have differed and as guidance and mercy for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: E non te revelamos o Libro, [Ó Muhammad], excepto para que faga claro para eles que onde teñen divergido e, como orientación e misericordia para os que cren.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has sent down rain from the sky and given life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who listen.
trans-unit.target: E Deus revelou a auga do ceo e da vida dada así á terra despois da súa falta de vida.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for you in grazing livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from what is in their bellies - between excretion and blood - pure milk, palatable to drinkers.
trans-unit.target: E, de feito, para que na alimentación de gando é unha lección.

trans-unit.source: And from the fruits of the palm trees and grapevines you take intoxicant and good provision. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who reason.
trans-unit.target: E a partir dos froitos das palmeiras e videiras tomar disposición intoxicante e bo.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord inspired to the bee, "Take for yourself among the mountains, houses, and among the trees and [in] that which they construct.
trans-unit.target: E o seu Señor inspirou a abella, "Teña a si mesmo entre os montes, casas, e entre as árbores e [en] o que constrúen.

trans-unit.source: Then eat from all the fruits and follow the ways of your Lord laid down [for you]." There emerges from their bellies a drink, varying in colors, in which there is healing for people. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: Entón comer de todos os froitos e siga polos camiños do teu Señor previsto [para]. "Hai emerxe das súas barrigas unha bebida, variando en cores, en que non é a cura para a xente. En realidade, no que é un sinal para un pobo

trans-unit.source: And Allah created you; then He will take you in death. And among you is he who is reversed to the most decrepit [old] age so that he will not know, after [having had] knowledge, a thing. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Competent.
trans-unit.target: E Deus vos creou;

trans-unit.source: And Allah has favored some of you over others in provision. But those who were favored would not hand over their provision to those whom their right hands possess so they would be equal to them therein. Then is it the favor of Allah they reject?
trans-unit.target: E Deus favoreceu algúns de vostedes sobre os outros en disposición.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you from yourselves mates and has made for you from your mates sons and grandchildren and has provided for you from the good things. Then in falsehood do they believe and in the favor of Allah they disbelieve?
trans-unit.target: E Deus fixo para ti de compañeiros de vós e fixo para ti dos seus compañeiros de fillos e netos, e providenciou para ti a partir das cousas boas.

trans-unit.source: And they worship besides Allah that which does not possess for them [the power of] provision from the heavens and the earth at all, and [in fact], they are unable.
trans-unit.target: E eles adoran, ademais de Deus que non posúe a eles [o poder de] disposición dos ceos e da terra en todo, e [en realidade], son incapaces.

trans-unit.source: So do not assert similarities to Allah. Indeed, Allah knows and you do not know.
trans-unit.target: Polo tanto, non afirman semellanzas con Allah.

trans-unit.source: Allah presents an example: a slave [who is] owned and unable to do a thing and he to whom We have provided from Us good provision, so he spends from it secretly and publicly. Can they be equal? Praise to Allah! But most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: Allah presenta un exemplo: un escravo [que] propiedade e incapaz de facer unha cousa e aquel a quen Nós fornecen dende Us boa disposición, de forma que gasta con iso secretaría e publicamente.

trans-unit.source: And Allah presents an example of two men, one of them dumb and unable to do a thing, while he is a burden to his guardian. Wherever he directs him, he brings no good. Is he equal to one who commands justice, while he is on a straight path?
trans-unit.target: E Allah presenta un exemplo de dous homes, un deles mudo e incapaz de facer unha cousa, mentres el é un fardo para o seu titor.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And the command for the Hour is not but as a glance of the eye or even nearer. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: A Deus pertence o invisible [aspectos] do ceo e da terra.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has extracted you from the wombs of your mothers not knowing a thing, and He made for you hearing and vision and intellect that perhaps you would be grateful.
trans-unit.target: E Deus extraeu-lo dos ventres das súas nais non saber algo, e que fixo por ti a audición e visión e intelecto que quizais sería grata.

trans-unit.source: Do they not see the birds controlled in the atmosphere of the sky? None holds them up except Allah. Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: Será que eles non ven as aves controladas na atmosfera do ceo?

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you from your homes a place of rest and made for you from the hides of the animals tents which you find light on your day of travel and your day of encampment; and from their wool, fur and hair is furnishing and enjoyment for a time.
trans-unit.target: E Deus fixo para ti a partir das súas casas un lugar de descanso e feito para ti a partir das peles dos animais tendas que atopa luz sobre o seu día de viaxe e seu día de campamento;

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you, from that which He has created, shadows and has made for you from the mountains, shelters and has made for you garments which protect you from the heat and garments which protect you from your [enemy in] battle. Thus does He complete His favor upon you that you might submit [to Him].
trans-unit.target: E Deus fixo para ti, do que El creou, sombras e fixo para ti a partir das montañas, abrigos e fixo para ti pezas de roupa que protexe-lo da calor e pezas de roupa que protexe-lo contra o seu [inimigo] batalla.

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, [O Muhammad] - then only upon you is [responsibility for] clear notification.
trans-unit.target: Pero, se se rexeitaren, [Ó Muhammad] - entón, só por riba de ti é [responsabilidade] notificación clara.

trans-unit.source: They recognize the favor of Allah; then they deny it. And most of them are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Eles recoñecen a graza de Deus;

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day when We will resurrect from every nation a witness. Then it will not be permitted to the disbelievers [to apologize or make excuses], nor will they be asked to appease [Allah].
trans-unit.target: E [mención] o día en que vai resucitar a partir de cada nación unha testemuña.

trans-unit.source: And when those who wronged see the punishment, it will not be lightened for them, nor will they be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: E cando os que injustiçado ver o castigo, non será máis lixeiro para eles, nin serán tolerados.

trans-unit.source: And when those who associated others with Allah see their "partners," they will say," Our Lord, these are our partners [to You] whom we used to invoke besides You." But they will throw at them the statement, "Indeed, you are liars."
trans-unit.target: E cando os que asociados outros con Allah ver os seus "socios", eles dirán: "O noso Señor, estes son os nosos socios [a vostede] quen usan para invocar ademais ti."

trans-unit.source: And they will impart to Allah that Day [their] submission, and lost from them is what they used to invent.
trans-unit.target: E van transmitir a Alá que o Día do [seu] submisión, e perdeu a partir deles é o que adoitaba inventar.

trans-unit.source: Those who disbelieved and averted [others] from the way of Allah - We will increase them in punishment over [their] punishment for what corruption they were causing.
trans-unit.target: Os incrédulos, que evitou [outros] no camiño de Deus - Imos aumenta-los en castigo sobre [súa] castigo polo que a corrupción que estaban causando.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day when We will resurrect among every nation a witness over them from themselves. And We will bring you, [O Muhammad], as a witness over your nation. And We have sent down to you the Book as clarification for all things and as guidance and mercy and good tidings for the Muslims.
trans-unit.target: E [mención] o día en que resucitará entre cada nación unha testemuña sobre eles dende si mesmos.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct and giving to relatives and forbids immorality and bad conduct and oppression. He admonishes you that perhaps you will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: De feito, Allah ordes de xustiza e de boa conduta e dando a parentes e prohibe a inmoralidade ea mala conduta e opresión.

trans-unit.source: And fulfill the covenant of Allah when you have taken it, [O believers], and do not break oaths after their confirmation while you have made Allah, over you, a witness. Indeed, Allah knows what you do.
trans-unit.target: E cumprir o pacto con Deus, despois de ter tomado, [Ó fieis], e non quebran xuramentos trala confirmación cando fixo Allah, sobre vostede, unha testemuña.

trans-unit.source: And do not be like she who untwisted her spun thread after it was strong [by] taking your oaths as [means of] deceit between you because one community is more plentiful [in number or wealth] than another community. Allah only tries you thereby. And He will surely make clear to you on the Day of Resurrection that over which you used to differ.
trans-unit.target: E non ser como ela, que sen torsión seu fío fiado despois que foi forte [por], tendo os seus xuramentos como [medio] dolo entre vostede, porque unha comunidade é máis abundante [en número ou da riqueza] que outra comunidade.

trans-unit.source: And if Allah had willed, He could have made you [of] one religion, but He causes to stray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And you will surely be questioned about what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: E se Deus quixese, podería ter feito se [de] unha relixión, pero El fai que a desviar-se quen queira e encamiña quen lle apraz.

trans-unit.source: And do not take your oaths as [means of] deceit between you, lest a foot slip after it was [once] firm, and you would taste evil [in this world] for what [people] you diverted from the way of Allah, and you would have [in the Hereafter] a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: E non levar os seus xuramentos como [medio] dolo entre vostede, para que un deslizamento de pé despois de ser [xa] firme, e que tería un sabor mal [neste mundo] para que [as persoas] vostede desviado do camiño de Deus,

trans-unit.source: And do not exchange the covenant of Allah for a small price. Indeed, what is with Allah is best for you, if only you could know.
trans-unit.target: E non trocan o pacto con Deus para un pequeno prezo.

trans-unit.source: Whatever you have will end, but what Allah has is lasting. And We will surely give those who were patient their reward according to the best of what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Todo o que tes vai acabar, pero o que Deus ten é duradeira.

trans-unit.source: Whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - We will surely cause him to live a good life, and We will surely give them their reward [in the Hereafter] according to the best of what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Quen practica a xustiza, sexa home ou muller, mentres el é un crente - Nós certamente pode levalo a vivir unha vida boa, e certamente pode darlles a súa recompensa [na outra vida] segundo o mellor que eles acostumaban facer.

trans-unit.source: So when you recite the Qur'an, [first] seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the expelled [from His mercy].
trans-unit.target: Entón, cando recitar o Corán, [primeiro] buscar refuxio en Allah contra Satanás, o expulsado [da súa misericordia].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, there is for him no authority over those who have believed and rely upon their Lord.
trans-unit.target: En realidade, non é para el ningunha autoridade sobre os fieis e confiar no seu Señor.

trans-unit.source: His authority is only over those who take him as an ally and those who through him associate others with Allah.
trans-unit.target: A súa autoridade só alcanza os que o toman como un aliado e quen por el asociar outros con Allah.

trans-unit.source: And when We substitute a verse in place of a verse - and Allah is most knowing of what He sends down - they say, "You, [O Muhammad], are but an inventor [of lies]." But most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: E cando substituímos un verso no lugar dun verso - e Deus é o máis coñecedor do que envía para baixo - eles din: "Vostede, [Ó Muhammad], son só un inventor [mentiras]."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "The Pure Spirit has brought it down from your Lord in truth to make firm those who believe and as guidance and good tidings to the Muslims."
trans-unit.target: Say, [Ó Muhammad] "O Espírito Puro trouxo-o para abaixo a partir do seu Señor, en realidade, para facer firme os que cren e como orientación e alvíssaras para os musulmáns."

trans-unit.source: And We certainly know that they say, "It is only a human being who teaches the Prophet." The tongue of the one they refer to is foreign, and this Qur'an is [in] a clear Arabic language.
trans-unit.target: E certamente sabemos que eles din, "É só un ser humano que ensina o Profeta."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who do not believe in the verses of Allah - Allah will not guide them, and for them is a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: De feito, os que non cren nos versículos de Deus - Deus non vai oriente-los, e para eles é un doloroso castigo.

trans-unit.source: They only invent falsehood who do not believe in the verses of Allah, and it is those who are the liars.
trans-unit.target: Eles só inventar mentira que non cren nos versículos de Deus, e é quen son os mentirosos.

trans-unit.source: Whoever disbelieves in Allah after his belief... except for one who is forced [to renounce his religion] while his heart is secure in faith. But those who [willingly] open their breasts to disbelief, upon them is wrath from Allah, and for them is a great punishment;
trans-unit.target: Quen non cre en Deus, despois da súa crenza ... con excepción dun que está obrigado [a renunciar á súa relixión] mentres o seu corazón está firme na fe.

trans-unit.source: That is because they preferred the worldly life over the Hereafter and that Allah does not guide the disbelieving people.
trans-unit.target: Isto é porque preferiron a vida mundana sobre a outra vida e que Deus non ilumina os incrédulos.

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones over whose hearts and hearing and vision Allah has sealed, and it is those who are the heedless.
trans-unit.target: Estes son os máis de cuxos corazóns e audición e visión Allah selou, e é quen son os desatentos.

trans-unit.source: Assuredly, it is they, in the Hereafter, who will be the losers.
trans-unit.target: Seguramente, é que, na outra vida, quen serán os perdedores.

trans-unit.source: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who emigrated after they had been compelled [to renounce their religion] and thereafter fought [for the cause of Allah] and were patient - indeed, your Lord, after that, is Forgiving and Merciful
trans-unit.target: Entón, en realidade, o seu señor, para os que emigraron despois de ser obrigados [a renunciar á súa relixión] e, posteriormente, loitou [á causa de Deus] e foron paciente - en realidade, o teu Señor, despois diso, é indulxente, Misericordiosíssimo

trans-unit.source: On the Day when every soul will come disputing for itself, and every soul will be fully compensated for what it did, and they will not be wronged.
trans-unit.target: O día en que cada alma virá disputando por si, e cada alma será totalmente compensado polo que fixo, e eles non serán defraudados.

trans-unit.source: And Allah presents an example: a city which was safe and secure, its provision coming to it in abundance from every location, but it denied the favors of Allah. So Allah made it taste the envelopment of hunger and fear for what they had been doing.
trans-unit.target: E Allah presenta un exemplo: unha cidade que foi cofre e seguro, a súa disposición de vir para a abundancia de todos os lugares, pero negou as mercés de Deus.

trans-unit.source: And there had certainly come to them a Messenger from among themselves, but they denied him; so punishment overtook them while they were wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: E alí estaba seguro veu para eles un mensaxeiro de entre si, pero negoulle;

trans-unit.source: Then eat of what Allah has provided for you [which is] lawful and good. And be grateful for the favor of Allah, if it is [indeed] Him that you worship.
trans-unit.target: Logo comer o que Deus proveu para ti [que é] lícito e bo.

trans-unit.source: He has only forbidden to you dead animals, blood, the flesh of swine, and that which has been dedicated to other than Allah. But whoever is forced [by necessity], neither desiring [it] nor transgressing [its limit] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ten só prohibiu a vostede animais mortos, sangue, a carne de porcino e todo o que foi dedicado ademais de Deus.

trans-unit.source: And do not say about what your tongues assert of untruth, "This is lawful and this is unlawful," to invent falsehood about Allah. Indeed, those who invent falsehood about Allah will not succeed.
trans-unit.target: E non diga sobre o que as súas linguas valer da inverdade, "Isto é legal e iso é ilegal," inventar mentiras acerca de Deus.

trans-unit.source: [It is but] a brief enjoyment, and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: [É só] unha breve avaliación, e terá un doloroso castigo.

trans-unit.source: And to those who are Jews We have prohibited that which We related to you before. And We did not wrong them [thereby], but they were wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: E para os que son xudeus Temos prohibida o que relacionado con vostede antes.

trans-unit.source: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who have done wrong out of ignorance and then repent after that and correct themselves - indeed, your Lord, thereafter, is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Entón, en realidade, o teu Señor, para aqueles que fixeron de malo por ignorancia e despois arrepentirse despois diso e corrixir-se - en realidade, o Señor, a partir de aí, é indulxente, Misericordiosíssimo.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Abraham was a [comprehensive] leader, devoutly obedient to Allah, inclining toward truth, and he was not of those who associate others with Allah.
trans-unit.target: De feito, Abraham era un [global] líder, devotas a Deus, inclinando cara á verdade, e non era dos que asociar outros con Allah.

trans-unit.source: [He was] grateful for His favors. Allah chose him and guided him to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: [Era] grata polos seus favores.

trans-unit.source: And We gave him good in this world, and indeed, in the Hereafter he will be among the righteous.
trans-unit.target: E lle ben neste mundo, e, de feito, o outro estará entre os virtuosos.

trans-unit.source: Then We revealed to you, [O Muhammad], to follow the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth; and he was not of those who associate with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Nós entón revelado a vostede, [Ó Muhammad], a seguir a relixión de Abraham, inclinando cara á verdade;

trans-unit.source: The sabbath was only appointed for those who differed over it. And indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.
trans-unit.target: O sábado foi só nomeado para os que divergiam sobre el.

trans-unit.source: Invite to the way of your Lord with wisdom and good instruction, and argue with them in a way that is best. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has strayed from His way, and He is most knowing of who is [rightly] guided.
trans-unit.target: Invitar a camiño do teu Señor con sabedoría e bo instrución, e discutir con eles dun xeito que é mellor.

trans-unit.source: And if you punish [an enemy, O believers], punish with an equivalent of that with which you were harmed. But if you are patient - it is better for those who are patient.
trans-unit.target: E se castigar [un inimigo, o crentes] castigar con un equivalente de que, co que foi prexudicado.

trans-unit.source: And be patient, [O Muhammad], and your patience is not but through Allah. And do not grieve over them and do not be in distress over what they conspire.
trans-unit.target: E ser paciente, [Ó Muhammad], ea súa paciencia non é, pero a través de Allah.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good.
trans-unit.target: En realidade, Deus está con aqueles que o temen e os que son benfeitores.

trans-unit.source: Exalted is He who took His Servant by night from al-Masjid al-Haram to al-Masjid al-Aqsa, whose surroundings We have blessed, to show him of Our signs. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Glorificado sexa quen tomou o seu servo durante a noite a partir de al-Masjid al-Haram á Al Masjid al-Aqsa, cuxo recinto bendizemos, para amosar-lle algúns dos nosos sinais.

trans-unit.source: And We gave Moses the Scripture and made it a guidance for the Children of Israel that you not take other than Me as Disposer of affairs,
trans-unit.target: E concedemos o Libro a Moisés e fixo unha orientación para os fillos de Israel que non levan diferente de min como Gardián,

trans-unit.source: O descendants of those We carried [in the ship] with Noah. Indeed, he was a grateful servant.
trans-unit.target: O descendentes daqueles Realizamos [en barco] co Noah.

trans-unit.source: And We conveyed to the Children of Israel in the Scripture that, "You will surely cause corruption on the earth twice, and you will surely reach [a degree of] great haughtiness.
trans-unit.target: E nós transmitida ós israelitas na Escritura que, "Certamente vai causar a corrupción na terra, dúas veces, e certamente vai chegar [a grao de] gran arrogancia.

trans-unit.source: So when the [time of] promise came for the first of them, We sent against you servants of Ours - those of great military might, and they probed [even] into the homes, and it was a promise fulfilled.
trans-unit.target: Así, cando o [tempo de] promesa chegou o primeiro deles, enviamos contra vós servos de Ours - aqueles de gran poderío militar, e sondado [mesmo] para as casas, e foi unha promesa cumprida.

trans-unit.source: Then We gave back to you a return victory over them. And We reinforced you with wealth and sons and made you more numerous in manpower
trans-unit.target: Entón, fixemos de volta para ti unha vitoria retorno sobre eles.

trans-unit.source: [And said], "If you do good, you do good for yourselves; and if you do evil, [you do it] to yourselves." Then when the final promise came, [We sent your enemies] to sadden your faces and to enter the temple in Jerusalem, as they entered it the first time, and to destroy what they had taken over with [total] destruction.
trans-unit.target: [Dixo]: "Se fai o ben, facer o ben para si mesmos, e se fai o mal, [facelo] para si mesmos."

trans-unit.source: [Then Allah said], "It is expected, [if you repent], that your Lord will have mercy upon you. But if you return [to sin], We will return [to punishment]. And We have made Hell, for the disbelievers, a prison-bed."
trans-unit.target: [Entón, Deus dixo]: "Espera-se, [se arrepentir], que o voso Señor teña misericordia de ti. Pero se volver [ao pecado], imos voltar [o castigo]. E fixemos o inferno, por

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this Qur'an guides to that which is most suitable and gives good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a great reward.
trans-unit.target: En realidade, este Corán orienta para o que é máis axeitado e dá boas novas para os fieis que practican actos de xustiza que terá unha gran recompensa.

trans-unit.source: And that those who do not believe in the Hereafter - We have prepared for them a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: E que os que non cren na outra vida - Nós preparamos para eles un castigo doloroso.

trans-unit.source: And man supplicates for evil as he supplicates for good, and man is ever hasty.
trans-unit.target: E o home suplica por mal como suplica para o ben, eo home é sempre apresurada.

trans-unit.source: And We have made the night and day two signs, and We erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day visible that you may seek bounty from your Lord and may know the number of years and the account [of time]. And everything We have set out in detail.
trans-unit.target: E fixemos os noite e día dous sinais, e apagado o sinal da noite e fixo o sinal do día visible que podes buscar recompensa do seu Señor e pode saber o número de anos ea conta [de tempo].

trans-unit.source: And [for] every person We have imposed his fate upon his neck, and We will produce for him on the Day of Resurrection a record which he will encounter spread open.
trans-unit.target: E [a] cada persoa que impuxeron o seu destino ao pescozo, e imos producir para el o Día da Resurrección un rexistro que atoparás estender aberto.

trans-unit.source: [It will be said], "Read your record. Sufficient is yourself against you this Day as accountant."
trans-unit.target: [Será dito], "Ler o seu rexistro. Suficiente é vostede mesmo contra ti este día como contador."

trans-unit.source: Whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] his soul. And whoever errs only errs against it. And no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. And never would We punish until We sent a messenger.
trans-unit.target: Quenquera que sexa guiado só é guiado para [o beneficio de] a súa alma.

trans-unit.source: And when We intend to destroy a city, We command its affluent but they defiantly disobey therein; so the word comes into effect upon it, and We destroy it with [complete] destruction.
trans-unit.target: E cando Pretendemos destruír unha cidade, nós comandar o seu afluente, pero desafiadoramente desobedecer nel;

trans-unit.source: And how many have We destroyed from the generations after Noah. And sufficient is your Lord, concerning the sins of His servants, as Acquainted and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: E cantos temos destruído das xeracións despois de Noé.

trans-unit.source: Whoever should desire the immediate - We hasten for him from it what We will to whom We intend. Then We have made for him Hell, which he will [enter to] burn, censured and banished.
trans-unit.target: Quen debe desexar a inmediata - Nós nos apressamos para el a partir del que imos a quen Pretendemos.

trans-unit.source: But whoever desires the Hereafter and exerts the effort due to it while he is a believer - it is those whose effort is ever appreciated [by Allah].
trans-unit.target: Pero quen quere a outra vida e exerce o esforzo debido a el mentres el é un crente - é aqueles cuxo esforzo é sempre apreciado [por Deus].

trans-unit.source: To each [category] We extend - to these and to those - from the gift of your Lord. And never has the gift of your Lord been restricted.
trans-unit.target: Para cada [categoría] Nós estenden - a estes e aqueles - desde o presente de seu Señor.

trans-unit.source: Look how We have favored [in provision] some of them over others. But the Hereafter is greater in degrees [of difference] and greater in distinction.
trans-unit.target: Vexa como Nós favorecer [na prestación de] algúns deles sobre os outros.

trans-unit.source: Do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity and [thereby] become censured and forsaken.
trans-unit.target: Non faga [como iguais] con Deus, outra divindade e [así] converterse en censurado e abandonado.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment. Whether one or both of them reach old age [while] with you, say not to them [so much as], "uff," and do not repel them but speak to them a noble word.
trans-unit.target: E o voso Señor decretou que non adoración excepto El, e para os pais, un bo trato.

trans-unit.source: And lower to them the wing of humility out of mercy and say, "My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up [when I was] small."
trans-unit.target: E inferior a eles a á da humildade por misericordia e dicir: "O meu señor, ten piedade de como me trouxo [cando estaba] pequena."

trans-unit.source: Your Lord is most knowing of what is within yourselves. If you should be righteous [in intention] - then indeed He is ever, to the often returning [to Him], Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Seu Señor é o máis coñecedor do que está dentro de si mesmos.

trans-unit.source: And give the relative his right, and [also] the poor and the traveler, and do not spend wastefully.
trans-unit.target: E dar o parente súa dereita, e [tamén] o pobre eo viaxeiro, e non gastar desperdiçada.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the wasteful are brothers of the devils, and ever has Satan been to his Lord ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: En realidade, o desperdicio son irmáns dos demos, e sempre foi Satanás ao seu Señor ingrato.

trans-unit.source: And if you [must] turn away from the needy awaiting mercy from your Lord which you expect, then speak to them a gentle word.
trans-unit.target: E se [debe] afastarse da misericordia agardando necesitados do seu Señor que espera, a continuación, falar-lles unha palabra amable.

trans-unit.source: And do not make your hand [as] chained to your neck or extend it completely and [thereby] become blamed and insolvent.
trans-unit.target: E non facer a súa man [como] encadeado a seu pescozo ou estendela lo completamente e [así] facerse culpable e insolvente.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. Indeed He is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: En realidade, o teu Señor esténdese provisión para quen quere e restrinxe [el].

trans-unit.source: And do not kill your children for fear of poverty. We provide for them and for you. Indeed, their killing is ever a great sin.
trans-unit.target: E non matan os seus fillos por medo da pobreza.

trans-unit.source: And do not approach unlawful sexual intercourse. Indeed, it is ever an immorality and is evil as a way.
trans-unit.target: E non achegarse a relación sexual ilegal.

trans-unit.source: And do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden, except by right. And whoever is killed unjustly - We have given his heir authority, but let him not exceed limits in [the matter of] taking life. Indeed, he has been supported [by the law].
trans-unit.target: E non matar a alma que Deus prohibiu, excepto por dereito.

trans-unit.source: And do not approach the property of an orphan, except in the way that is best, until he reaches maturity. And fulfill [every] commitment. Indeed, the commitment is ever [that about which one will be] questioned.
trans-unit.target: E non achegarse a propiedade dun orfo, excepto na forma que é mellor, ata que chega á madurez.

trans-unit.source: And give full measure when you measure, and weigh with an even balance. That is the best [way] and best in result.
trans-unit.target: E dar plena medida cando medir e pesar cun saldo aínda.

trans-unit.source: And do not pursue that of which you have no knowledge. Indeed, the hearing, the sight and the heart - about all those [one] will be questioned.
trans-unit.target: E non continuar a de que non ten coñecemento.

trans-unit.source: And do not walk upon the earth exultantly. Indeed, you will never tear the earth [apart], and you will never reach the mountains in height.
trans-unit.target: E non se camiñar sobre a terra, exultante.

trans-unit.source: All that - its evil is ever, in the sight of your Lord, detested.
trans-unit.target: Todo o que - o seu mal sempre, aos ollos do teu Señor, detestaba.

trans-unit.source: That is from what your Lord has revealed to you, [O Muhammad], of wisdom. And, [O mankind], do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity, lest you be thrown into Hell, blamed and banished.
trans-unit.target: Isto é o que o seu Señor lle revelou, [Ó Muhammad] de sabedoría.

trans-unit.source: Then, has your Lord chosen you for [having] sons and taken from among the angels daughters? Indeed, you say a grave saying.
trans-unit.target: Entón, ten o seu Señor escolleu para [tendo] fillos e tomado entre as fillas anxos?

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly diversified [the contents] in this Qur'an that mankind may be reminded, but it does not increase the disbelievers except in aversion.
trans-unit.target: E nós temos seguro diversificada [o contido] neste Corán que a humanidade pode lembrar, pero non aumenta os incrédulos, excepto en aversión.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "If there had been with Him [other] gods, as they say, then they [each] would have sought to the Owner of the Throne a way."
trans-unit.target: Say, [Ó Muhammad] "Se houbese con El [outros] deuses, como eles din, entón eles [cada] tería buscado o propietario do Trono un camiño."

trans-unit.source: Exalted is He and high above what they say by great sublimity.
trans-unit.target: Exaltado e é alta por riba do que din por gran sublimidade.

trans-unit.source: The seven heavens and the earth and whatever is in them exalt Him. And there is not a thing except that it exalts [Allah] by His praise, but you do not understand their [way of] exalting. Indeed, He is ever Forbearing and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Os sete ceos ea terra e todo o que neles hai exaltarei.

trans-unit.source: And when you recite the Qur'an, We put between you and those who do not believe in the Hereafter a concealed partition.
trans-unit.target: E cando recitar o Corán, Poñemos entre vostede e os que non cren na outra vida unha partición oculta.

trans-unit.source: And We have placed over their hearts coverings, lest they understand it, and in their ears deafness. And when you mention your Lord alone in the Qur'an, they turn back in aversion.
trans-unit.target: E nós temos colocado sobre os seus revestimentos corazóns, para que non comprende-lo, e no seu oído xordeira.

trans-unit.source: We are most knowing of how they listen to it when they listen to you and [of] when they are in private conversation, when the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: Somos o máis coñecedor de como oín-la cando oín-lo e [de] cando están en conversa privada, cando os inicuos din: "Non seguir, pero un home afectado por maxia."

trans-unit.source: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way.
trans-unit.target: Vexa como folga para comparacións;

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we [truly] be resurrected as a new creation?"
trans-unit.target: E eles din: "Cando estamos ósos e partículas desintegrada, imos [verdadeiramente] ser resucitados como unha nova creación?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Be you stones or iron
trans-unit.target: Diga: "É vostede pedras ou ferro

trans-unit.source: Or [any] creation of that which is great within your breasts." And they will say, "Who will restore us?" Say, "He who brought you forth the first time." Then they will nod their heads toward you and say, "When is that?" Say, "Perhaps it will be soon -
trans-unit.target: Ou [calquera] creación aquilo que é grande dentro dos seus seos. "E dirán:" Quen vai devolver-nos? "Diga:" Quen vos deu a luz por primeira vez. "Entón eles van acenar coa cabeza cara a ti e dicir

trans-unit.source: On the Day He will call you and you will respond with praise of Him and think that you had not remained [in the world] except for a little."
trans-unit.target: O día en que vai chamalo e vai responder con loanza a el e creo que non permanecera [no mundo], excepto para un pouco. "

trans-unit.source: And tell My servants to say that which is best. Indeed, Satan induces [dissension] among them. Indeed Satan is ever, to mankind, a clear enemy.
trans-unit.target: E diga meus servos, para dicir que o que é mellor.

trans-unit.source: Your Lord is most knowing of you. If He wills, He will have mercy upon you; or if He wills, He will punish you. And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], over them as a manager.
trans-unit.target: Seu Señor é o máis coñecedor de vós.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord is most knowing of whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And We have made some of the prophets exceed others [in various ways], and to David We gave the book [of Psalms].
trans-unit.target: E o teu Señor é o máis coñecedor de que está no ceo e na terra.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Invoke those you have claimed [as gods] besides Him, for they do not possess the [ability for] removal of adversity from you or [for its] transfer [to someone else]."
trans-unit.target: Diga: "Chama os que teñen reclamado [como deuses] alén del, para que eles non teñen a [capacidade de] eliminación de adversidades de ti ou [polo seu] transferencia [a outra persoa]."

trans-unit.source: Those whom they invoke seek means of access to their Lord, [striving as to] which of them would be nearest, and they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment. Indeed, the punishment of your Lord is ever feared.
trans-unit.target: Aqueles a quen eles invocan buscar medios de acceso ao seu Señor, [esforzarse a] cal deles sería máis próximo, e esperan a súa misericordia e temen o seu castigo.

trans-unit.source: And there is no city but that We will destroy it before the Day of Resurrection or punish it with a severe punishment. That has ever been in the Register inscribed.
trans-unit.target: E non hai ningunha cidade, pero que imos destruír-lo antes do Día da Resurrección ou puni-lo con un castigo severa.

trans-unit.source: And nothing has prevented Us from sending signs except that the former peoples denied them. And We gave Thamud the she-camel as a visible sign, but they wronged her. And We send not the signs except as a warning.
trans-unit.target: E nada nos impediu enviar sinais, agás que os antigos pobos negou-lles.

trans-unit.source: And [remember, O Muhammad], when We told you, "Indeed, your Lord has encompassed the people." And We did not make the sight which We showed you except as a trial for the people, as was the accursed tree [mentioned] in the Qur'an. And We threaten them, but it increases them not except in great transgression.
trans-unit.target: E [lembre, oh Muhammad], cando contámosvos: "O teu Señor abrangueu as persoas."

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when We said to the angles, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except for Iblees. He said, "Should I prostrate to one You created from clay?"
trans-unit.target: E [mención] cando dixemos aos ángulos, "prostrado a Adán:" E todo se prostráronse, excepto Iblis.

trans-unit.source: [Iblees] said, "Do You see this one whom You have honored above me? If You delay me until the Day of Resurrection, I will surely destroy his descendants, except for a few."
trans-unit.target: [Lucifer] dixo: "Vostede ve este quen Ten honrado por riba de min? Se me atrasar ata o Día da Resurrección, eu certamente pode destruír os seus descendentes, con excepción dalgúns."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Go, for whoever of them follows you, indeed Hell will be the recompense of you - an ample recompense.
trans-unit.target: [Alá] dixo: "Vaia, para os que deles segue-o, realidade, o inferno será a recompensa de vós - un amplo recompensa.

trans-unit.source: And incite [to senselessness] whoever you can among them with your voice and assault them with your horses and foot soldiers and become a partner in their wealth and their children and promise them." But Satan does not promise them except delusion.
trans-unit.target: E incitar [a falta de sentido] quen poida entre eles coa súa voz e ataca-los cos seus cabalos e soldados de infantería e tornar-se un compañeiro na súa riqueza e os seus fillos e prometer-lles. "Pero Satanás non prometer-lles senón ilusións.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, over My [believing] servants there is for you no authority. And sufficient is your Lord as Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: De feito, sobre a miña [crendo] servos non é para ti ningunha autoridade.

trans-unit.source: It is your Lord who drives the ship for you through the sea that you may seek of His bounty. Indeed, He is ever, to you, Merciful.
trans-unit.target: É o seu Señor que dirixe o barco para vostede a través do mar que se pode buscar a súa graza.

trans-unit.source: And when adversity touches you at sea, lost are [all] those you invoke except for Him. But when He delivers you to the land, you turn away [from Him]. And ever is man ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: E cando a adversidade che toca no mar, perdida son [todos] os invocar, excepto para El.

trans-unit.source: Then do you feel secure that [instead] He will not cause a part of the land to swallow you or send against you a storm of stones? Then you would not find for yourselves an advocate.
trans-unit.target: Logo facelo sentirse seguro de que [en lugar] El non vai causar unha parte da terra para comelas-lo ou enviar contra ti unha tempestade de pedras?

trans-unit.source: Or do you feel secure that He will not send you back into the sea another time and send upon you a hurricane of wind and drown you for what you denied? Then you would not find for yourselves against Us an avenger.
trans-unit.target: Ou se sentir seguro de que non vai mandar de volta ao mar outra vez e enviarei sobre vós un furacán de vento e afoga-lo para o que negou?

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly honored the children of Adam and carried them on the land and sea and provided for them of the good things and preferred them over much of what We have created, with [definite] preference.
trans-unit.target: E nós temos seguro honrado os fillos de Adán e levou-os na terra e no mar e prevía a eles das cousas boas e preferiu los sobre moito do que Creamos, con preferencia [definido].

trans-unit.source: [Mention, O Muhammad], the Day We will call forth every people with their record [of deeds]. Then whoever is given his record in his right hand - those will read their records, and injustice will not be done to them, [even] as much as a thread [inside the date seed].
trans-unit.target: [Mención, ó Muhammad], o día en que vai suscitar cada pobo co seu rexistro [de accións].

trans-unit.source: And whoever is blind in this [life] will be blind in the Hereafter and more astray in way.
trans-unit.target: E quen é cego neste [vida] será cego no outro, e máis desencaminhado en forma.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, they were about to tempt you away from that which We revealed to you in order to [make] you invent about Us something else; and then they would have taken you as a friend.
